test-case.name: fn-string-join2args-1
test-case.Creator: Carmelo Montanez
test-case.description: Evaluates the "string-join" function with the arguments set as follows: $arg1 = xs:string(lower bound) $arg2 = xs:string(lower bound).

test-case.name: fn-string-join2args-2
test-case.Creator: Carmelo Montanez
test-case.description: Evaluates the "string-join" function with the arguments set as follows: $arg1 = xs:string(mid range) $arg2 = xs:string(lower bound).

test-case.name: fn-string-join2args-3
test-case.Creator: Carmelo Montanez
test-case.description: Evaluates the "string-join" function with the arguments set as follows: $arg1 = xs:string(upper bound) $arg2 = xs:string(lower bound).

test-case.Creator: Carmelo Montanez
test-case.description: Evaluates the "string-join" function with the arguments set as follows: $arg1 = xs:string(lower bound) $arg2 = xs:string(mid range).

test-case.name: fn-string-join2args-5
test-case.Creator: Carmelo Montanez
test-case.description: Evaluates the "string-join" function with the arguments set as follows: $arg1 = xs:string(lower bound) $arg2 = xs:string(upper bound).

test-case.name: fn-string-join-4
test-case.Creator: Carmelo Montanez
test-case.description: Evaluates the "string-join" function with the arguments set as follows: $arg1 = () $arg2 = "". Use of fn:count to avoid empty file.

test-case.Creator: Carmelo Montanez
test-case.description: Evaluates the "string-join" function with the arguments set as follows: $arg1 = "" $arg2 = "". Use of fn:count to avoid empty file.

test-case.Creator: Carmelo Montanez
test-case.description: Evaluates the "string-join" function with the arguments set as follows: $arg1 = "" $arg2 = "A Character String". Use of fn:count to avoid empty file.

test-case.Creator: Carmelo Montanez
test-case.description: Evaluates the "string-join" function with the arguments set as follows: $arg1 = () $arg2 = "A Character String". Use of fn:count to avoid empty file.

test-case.Creator: Carmelo Montanez
test-case.description: Evaluates the "string-join" function with the arguments set as follows: $arg1 = "AAAAABBBBBCCCCC" $arg2 = "BBBBB".

test-case.description: Evaluates the "string-join" function with the arguments set as follows: $arg1 = "AAAAABBBBB" $arg2 = " ".

test-case.Creator: Carmelo Montanez
test-case.description: Evaluates the "string-join" function with the arguments set as follows: $arg1 = " " $arg2 = "AAAAABBBBB". Use of fn:count to avoid empty file.

test-case.description: Evaluates the "string-join" function with the arguments set as follows: $arg1 = xs:string("A") $arg2 = "A".

test-case.description: Evaluates the "string-join" function with the arguments set as follows: $arg1 = "A" $arg2 = xs:string("A").

test-case.description: Evaluates the "string-join" function with the arguments set as follows: $arg1 = "A" $arg2 = "a".

test-case.name: fn-string-join-17

test-case.name: fn-string-join-18

test-case.name: fn-string-join-19

test-case.description: Evaluates the "string-join" function with the arguments set as follows: $arg1 = "****" $arg2 = "***".

test-case.name: fn-string-join-20
test-case.Creator: Carmelo Montanez
test-case.description: Evaluates the "string-join" function using numbers as part of the string. Arguments set as follows: $arg1 = "12345" $arg2 = "1234".

test-case.name: fn-string-join-21
test-case.Creator: Carmelo Montanez
test-case.description: Evaluates the "string-join" function using "string-join" backwards. Arguments set as follows: $arg1 = "string-join" $arg2 = "nioj-gnirts".

test-case.Creator: Frans Englich
test-case.name: K-StringJoinFunc-1
test-case.description: A test whose essence is: `string-join("a string")`.

test-case.Creator: Frans Englich
test-case.name: K-StringJoinFunc-2
test-case.description: A test whose essence is: `string-join("a string", "a string", "wrong param")`.

test-case.Creator: Frans Englich
test-case.name: K-StringJoinFunc-3
test-case.description: A test whose essence is: `string-join(('Now', 'is', 'the', 'time', '...'), ' ') eq "Now is the time ..."`.

test-case.Creator: Frans Englich
test-case.name: K-StringJoinFunc-4
test-case.description: A test whose essence is: `string-join(("abc", "def"), "") eq "abcdef"`.

test-case.Creator: Frans Englich
test-case.name: K-StringJoinFunc-5
test-case.description: A test whose essence is: `string-join(('Blow, ', 'blow, ', 'thou ', 'winter ', 'wind!'), '') eq "Blow, blow, thou winter wind!"`.

test-case.Creator: Frans Englich
test-case.name: K-StringJoinFunc-6
test-case.description: A test whose essence is: `string-join((), 'separator') eq ""`.

test-case.Creator: Frans Englich
test-case.name: K-StringJoinFunc-7
test-case.description: A test whose essence is: `string-join("a string", ())`.
